content.full_text: Abraham Lincoln to Henry E. Dummer, 28 March 18531
paragraphs: Abraham Lincoln to Henry E. Dummer, 28 March 18531

footnotes.text: 1Abraham Lincoln wrote and signed this letter.

2No additional correspondence between Lincoln and Henry E. Dummer related to this loan
                  has been located. It is unclear, therefore, when and why Dummer loaned Lincoln the
                  $2.50 that Lincoln repaid with the $3.00  he enclosed in this letter.

structured_content.text: Abraham Lincoln to Henry E. Dummer, 28 March 18531
